pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Implementation of the Diffusion Decision Model // Provides the probability density function (PDF) and cumulative distribution function (CDF) of the diffusion decision model (DDM; e.g., Ratcliff McKoon, 2008, doi:10.1162/neco.2008.12-06-420) with across-trial variability in the drift rate. Because the PDF and CDF of the DDM both contain an infinite sum, they needs to be approximated. 'fddm' implements all published approximations (Navarro Fuss, 2009, doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2009.02.003; Gondan, Blurton, Kesselmeier, 2014, doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2014.05.002; Blurton, Kesselmeier, Gondan, 2017, doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2016.11.003) plus new approximations. All approximations are implemented purely in 'C++' providing faster speed than existing packages.
